# **Stream handling giáº£i quyáº¿t nhá»¯ng váº¥n Ä‘á» gÃ¬?**

# **Má»¥c tiÃªu ngáº¯n gá»n**

Giao thá»©c TCP byte-stream Ä‘á»ƒ:

* Gá»­i/nháº­n nhiá»u loáº¡i message (meta, chunk file, control).  
* Äáº£m báº£o message nguyÃªn váº¹n, phÃ¢n rÃ£/ghÃ©p Ä‘Ãºng.

* ÄÆ¡n giáº£n, dá»… cÃ i Ä‘áº·t vá»›i C/Java/Kotlin.

# **PhÃ¢n táº§ng trong thiáº¿t káº¿ protocol táº§ng á»©ng dá»¥ng**

Äá»ƒ truyá»n dá»¯ liá»‡u qua TCP stream, báº¡n pháº£i lÃ m 3 lá»›p:

(1) Byte stream â†’ (2) Message â†’ (3) Logic cá»§a báº¡n (file-sharing)

1\) **Byte stream**: Do OS phá»¥ trÃ¡ch

2\) **Message layer (framing \+ header)**

ÄÃ¢y lÃ  táº§ng báº¡n pháº£i tá»± code:

* Thiáº¿t káº¿ cÃ¡c loáº¡i message  
* CÆ¡ cháº¿ phÃ¢n tÃ¡ch cÃ¡c message

**3\) Business logic** File chunking, ACK, Resume, State machineâ€¦

# 

# **Nhá»¯ng thá»© cáº§n thiáº¿t káº¿**

Spec TCP stream cho file-sharing (bao gá»“m framing, header, checksum, chunking, ACK/retransmit, reconnect, vÃ  state machine).

* Framing \= cÃ¡ch báº¡n â€œÄ‘Ã³ng khungâ€ má»™t message trong dÃ²ng byte TCP â†’ táº¡ch biá»‡t cÃ¡c message trong dÃ²ng byte nÃ y.  
* Chunk: chia nhá» dá»¯ liá»‡u â†’ gá»­i theo block, há»— trá»£ resume, truyá»n song song, pinelined  
* ACK: xÃ¡c nháº­n Ä‘Ã£ nháº­n thÃ nh cÃ´ng message, chunk  
* Retransmit: gá»­i láº¡i dá»¯ liá»‡u náº¿u ACK khÃ´ng Ä‘áº¿n  
* **Reconnect** \= logic khÃ´i phá»¥c quÃ¡ trÃ¬nh download, upload sau khi káº¿t ná»‘i TCP bá»‹ máº¥t giá»¯a chá»«ng.  
* State machine \= mÃ´ táº£ tá»«ng tráº¡ng thÃ¡i cá»§a protocol vÃ  cÃ¡ch chuyá»ƒn giá»¯a chÃºng bao gá»“m cáº£ sender vÃ  receiver.  
  * `VÃ­ dá»¥ sender trong quÃ¡ trÃ¬nh upload file: CONNECT â†’ AUTHENTICATED â†’ SENDING_META â†’ SENDING_CHUNKS â†’ COMPLETE`  
  * `Receiver cÅ©ng cÃ³ state machine riÃªng: WAIT_META â†’ WAIT_CHUNKS â†’ FILE_READY`

# \*Tháº¯c máº¯c

# Tháº¯c máº¯c

`CÃ³ cáº§n thiáº¿t thiáº¿t káº¿ checksum khi mÃ  truyá»n qua TCP Ä‘Ã£ sáºµn cÃ³ cÆ¡ cháº¿ cá»§a TCP`

`Xá»­ lÃ½ Retransmit: gá»­i láº¡i dá»¯ liá»‡u náº¿u ACK khÃ´ng Ä‘áº¿n`

Gá»™p chung ACK cá»§a DATA\_CHUNK vá»›i bÃ¬nh thÆ°á»ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c ko do cÃ³ request id rá»“i mÃ ?

CÃ³ nÃªn xá»­ lÃ½ viá»‡c upload Ä‘a luá»“ng gá»­i nhiá»u chunk â†’ bitmap ACK?

- [ ] Bá»™ code **serialize/deserialize** tá»‘i Æ°u

- [ ] Packet builder \+ reader

Quáº£n lÃ½ state vá»›i state machine cho tá»«ng tcp conn session  
CÆ¡ cháº¿ Magic Ä‘á»ƒ Ä‘áº£m báº£o phÃ¢n biá»‡t cÃ¡c packet

LÃ m sao Ä‘á»ƒ quáº£n lÃ½ nhá»¯ng gÃ³i tin Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c chuyá»ƒn Ä‘i bá»Ÿi sender, vÃ  callback (hoáº·c xá»­ lÃ½ khi cÃ³ ACK/ERROR)

1 conn TCP cho cÃ¡c CMD trong UI, upload, download sá»­ dá»¥ng 1 conn khÃ¡c. â†’ **Bá» lÃºc upload thÃ¬ khÃ³a UI (Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n hÃ³)**

AÄ‘á»‘i vá»›i trao Ä‘á»•i server vÃ  client thÃ´ng qua 1 TCP socket thÃ¬ má»—i lÃºc chá»‰ Ä‘Æ°á»£c ghi 1 gÃ³i tin vÃ o socket Ä‘Ãºng ko? Má»—i hÃ nh Ä‘á»™ng ghi hoáº·c Ä‘á»c pháº£i lÃ  atomic Ã ?

# Framing

# **Tá»•ng quan framing**

Má»—i message trÃªn TCP dÃ¹ng **length-prefix \+ type \+ payload**:

\[Total\_length\]\[MsgType\]\[Header\]\[Payload\]

* total\_length: uint32 network-order, tÃ­nh tá»« byte `msg_type` Ä‘áº¿n háº¿t payload (khÃ´ng tÃ­nh 4 bytes length).  
* msg\_type: 1 byte code loáº¡i message. (DATA, CMD, RESPOND)  
* header\_fields: tÃ¹y loáº¡i message; cá»‘ gáº¯ng giá»¯ header cá»‘ Ä‘á»‹nh kÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c tháº¥p (vÃ­ dá»¥ 8â€“16 bytes) Ä‘á»ƒ parse nhanh.  
  * **AUTH: \[RequestId\]\[AUTH\_TOKEN\] â†’ dÃ¹ng Ä‘á»ƒ resume auth, hoáº·c láº§n khÃ¡c ko cáº§n Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p**  
  * **CMD: \[RequestId\] â†’ má»i CMD Ä‘á»u cáº§n chá» RES**  
  * **RESPOND: \[RequestId\]\[Status\] â†’ dÃ¹ng cho pháº£n há»“i cho CMD, AUTH, DATA**  
  * **DATA:\[RequestId\]\[FileId\]\[ChunkIndex\]\[ChunkLength\]â†’ má»—i DATA cÅ©ng tÆ°ng tá»± nhÆ° CMD cÅ©ng cáº§n 1 RES Ä‘á»ƒ accept. NghÄ©a lÃ  lÃºc upload sáº½ upload tá»«ng DATA má»™t. CÃ’n lÃºc download thÃ¬ yÃªu cáº§u tá»«ng DATA má»™t.**  
    * **RequestId lÃ  Id khÃ¡c nhau giá»¯a cÃ¡c DATA**

## **A) Khi gá»­i (WRITE)**

## **B) Khi nháº­n (READ)**

### **â‘  Äá»c Ä‘Ãºng N byte length header (read\_exact)**

â†’ Ä‘Æ°a vÃ o logic (chunk/ACK/â€¦), chuyá»ƒn Ä‘áº¿n handler,... khÃ´ng liÃªn quan TCP.

# HÃ m há»— trá»£

# HÃ m há»— trá»£

* **read\_exact(sock, buf, n)**: loop cho Ä‘áº¿n khi Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘á»c Ä‘á»§ n byte hoáº·c lá»—i/EOF.  
* **write\_all(sock, buf, n)**: loop cho tá»›i khi gá»­i háº¿t n byte hoáº·c lá»—i.

### HÃ m gá»­i chuáº©n (send\_all)

`ssize_t write_all(int fd, const void *buf, size_t len) {`

    `size_t sent = 0;`

    `while (sent < len) {`

        `ssize_t n = send(fd, (char*)buf + sent, len - sent, 0);`

        `if (n <= 0) return n;`

        `sent += n;`

    `}`

    `return sent;`

`}`

### HÃ m nháº­n chuáº©n (recv\_all)

`ssize_t` read\_exact`(int fd, void *buf, size_t len) {`  
    `size_t received = 0;`  
    `while (received < len) {`  
        `ssize_t n = recv(fd, (char*)buf + received, len - received, 0);`  
        `if (n <= 0) return n;`  
        `received += n;`  
    `}`  
    `return received;`  
`}`

# LÃºc gá»­i gÃ³i tin

**`TrÆ°á»›c Ä‘Ã³ gÃ³i tin Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c gÃ¡n payload thÃ nh JSON.`**

`// HÃ m gá»­i packet`  
`int send_packet(int fd, uint8_t type, const void *payload, uint32_t payload_len) {`  
    `PacketHeader header;`  
    `header.type = type;`  
    `header.length = htonl(payload_len); // convert length sang network byte order`

    `// Gá»­i header`  
    `if (write_all(fd, &header, sizeof(header)) < 0) return -1;`

    `// Gá»­i payload`  
    `if (payload_len > 0 && write_all(fd, payload, payload_len) < 0) return -1;`

    `return 0; // thÃ nh cÃ´ng`  
`}`

# Handle lÃºc nháº­n gÃ³i tin

# Handle lÃºc nháº­n gÃ³i tin

TCP chá»‰ Ä‘Æ°a byte liÃªn tá»¥c â†’ báº¡n pháº£i tá»± táº¡o message.

Má»—i láº§n gá»­i: serialize thÃ nh `[header N byte][payload]` vÃ  write\_all.

Má»—i láº§n nháº­n: read\_exact N byte   
â†’ láº¥y giÃ¡ trá»‹ trÆ°á»ng length â†’ biáº¿t bao nhiÃªu byte â†’ read\_exact tiáº¿p â†’ payload  
â†’ láº¥y giÃ¡ trá»‹ trÆ°á»ng type â†’ chuyá»ƒn payload Ä‘áº¿n handle tÆ°Æ¡ng á»©ng.

# **Quy trÃ¬nh nháº­n packet hoÃ n chá»‰nh**

    // Äá»c header  
    if (read\_exact(fd, \&header, sizeof(header)) \<= 0\) return \-1;

    uint32\_t payload\_len \= ntohl(header.length);  
    uint8\_t \*payload \= malloc(payload\_len);  
    if (\!payload) return \-1;

    // Äá»c payload  
    if (read\_exact(fd, payload, payload\_len) \<= 0\) {  
        free(payload);  
        return \-1;  
    }

# Táº¡i sao?

# **Táº¡i sao cÃ¡ch nÃ y lÃ  â€œchuáº©nâ€?**

### **âœ” KhÃ´ng bao giá» lá»‡ch packet (vÃ¬ báº¡n Ä‘á»c Ä‘Ãºng length)**

### **âœ” KhÃ´ng bá»‹ split TCP (vÃ¬ recv\_all Ä‘á»c Ä‘á»§)**

# Upload file

		`Sender â†’ gá»­i Chunk #10`

# Chunking

# Chunking

Chunking: Chia file cáº§n truyá»n táº£i thÃ nh chunks kÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c cá»‘ Ä‘á»‹nh (vÃ­ dá»¥ 64 KiB \= 65536\) trá»« chunk cuá»‘i cÃ¹ng

**KÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c chunk cá»‘ Ä‘á»‹nh do bÃªn gá»­i quyáº¿t Ä‘á»‹nh**, nhÆ°ng chunk cuá»‘i cÃ¹ng thÆ°á»ng nhá» hÆ¡n Ä‘á»ƒ vá»«a vá»›i file. Client vÃ  server chá»‰ cáº§n thá»‘ng nháº¥t kÃ­ch thÆ°á»›c chunk chuáº©n.  
**TÃ¡c dá»¥ng:**

* Truyá»n file qua máº¡ng á»•n Ä‘á»‹nh  
* File vÃ i GB mÃ  Ä‘á»c cáº£ file vÃ o RAM cÃ¹ng lÃºc â†’ ráº¥t tá»‘n bá»™ nhá»›. Chunk nhá» giÃºp client/server Ä‘á»c vÃ  xá»­ lÃ½ tá»«ng pháº§n, khÃ´ng cáº§n náº¡p toÃ n bá»™ file.  
* Há»— trá»£ resume / táº£i tiáº¿p tá»¥c  
* Kiá»ƒm tra lá»—i tá»«ng pháº§n  
* Song song hÃ³a, tÄƒng tá»‘c.

**FILE\_META xÃ¡c Ä‘á»‹nh chunkSize Ä‘á»ƒ cáº£ hai bÃªn thá»‘ng nháº¥t.**

Má»—i chunk gá»­i nhÆ° FILE\_CHUNK Ä‘á»™c láº­p (cÃ³ index). Cho phÃ©p **parallel / pipelined sending**.

# Retransmit

**Reliability & retransmit**

**Retransmit: gá»­i láº¡i dá»¯ liá»‡u náº¿u ACK khÃ´ng Ä‘áº¿n**

* Khi gá»­i chunk, sender giá»¯ chunk trong buffer Ä‘áº¿n khi nháº­n CHUNK\_ACK (status 0).  
* Náº¿u ACK khÃ´ng Ä‘áº¿n trong timeout T (vÃ­ dá»¥ 5s), sender retransmit chunk (tá»‘i Ä‘a N láº§n). TÃ¹y á»©ng dá»¥ng, dÃ¹ng exponential backoff.  
* Náº¿u CHUNK\_ACK tráº£ status=1 (corrupt), sender resend ngay.

# \*Reconnect

# Reconnect

Khi heartbeat gá»­i ko cÃ³ pháº£n há»“i â†’ bá»‹ máº¥t káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i server. LÃºc kÃ­ch hoáº¡t reconnect (báº±ng áº¥n nÃºt trÃªn UI) â†’ thá»±c hiá»‡n quÃ¡ trÃ¬nh reconnect.  
Táº¡o conn má»›i Ä‘áº¿n server.

`Khi client káº¿t ná»‘i láº¡i:`

* `Reauth â†’ OK ->`   
* `Kiá»ƒm tra onGoingSesssion.`  
* `Gá»­i yÃªu cáº§u resume session Ä‘áº¿n server.`  
* `Server bÃ¡o Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ chunk 0â€“532`  
* `Client gá»­i tiáº¿p chunk 533 trá»Ÿ Ä‘i`

`Reconnect logic giÃºp khÃ´ng pháº£i gá»­i láº¡i tá»« Ä‘áº§u.`

`YÃªu cáº§u:`

+ `LÃºc tÃ¡i khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng láº¡i conn, RE_AUTH, SESSION_RESUME (kiá»ƒm tra xem cÃ³ session nÃ o Ä‘ang cháº¡y ko)`

# **Reconnect logic**

* Khi client reconnects, gá»­i HELLO, AUTH (náº¿u cáº§n) rá»“i gá»­i REQUEST\_RESUME hoáº·c há»i server: "server Ä‘Ã£ nháº­n tá»›i chunkIndex nÃ o cá»§a fileId?" Server tráº£ danh sÃ¡ch chunk Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ (bitmap, last contiguous index, hoáº·c highest index).

* Sender chá»‰ gá»­i cÃ¡c chunk cÃ²n thiáº¿u.

# **Ká»‹ch báº£n resume nhanh (practical)**

* Server lÆ°u láº¡i bitmap cÃ¡c chunk Ä‘Ã£ nháº­n cho má»—i fileID (vÃ­ dá»¥ trÃªn disk or DB).  
* Khi reconnect, client gá»­i REQUEST\_RESUME(fileId) \-\> server tráº£ bitmap  
  Client chá»‰ gá»­i cÃ¡c chunk trong missing ranges.

## Giáº£i thÃ­ch

1. Bitmap

LÃ  má»™t máº£ng bit, má»—i bit tÆ°á»£ng trÆ°ng cho má»™t chunk.  
Bit \= 1 â†’ server Ä‘Ã£ cÃ³ chunk Ä‘Ã³.  
Bit \= 0 â†’ server chÆ°a cÃ³ chunk Ä‘Ã³  
VÃ­ dá»¥: náº¿u file chia thÃ nh 8 chunk, bitmap 10110100

2\. Last contiguous index (LCI)  
LÃ  chá»‰ sá»‘ chunk liÃªn tá»¥c cuá»‘i cÃ¹ng mÃ  server Ä‘Ã£ nháº­n tá»« Ä‘áº§u file.  
VÃ­ dá»¥, náº¿u server cÃ³ chunks 0, 1, 2, 3, 5, 6:  
last contiguous index \= 3 (vÃ¬ 0â€“3 liÃªn tá»¥c)  
Nhá»¯ng chunk sau LCI mÃ  server cÃ³, nhÆ°ng khÃ´ng liÃªn tá»¥c (vÃ­ dá»¥ chunk 5, 6\) sáº½ cáº§n bitmap hoáº·c danh sÃ¡ch riÃªng Ä‘á»ƒ mÃ´ táº£.  
Æ¯u Ä‘iá»ƒm: Ä‘Æ¡n giáº£n, tá»‘t cho download tuáº§n tá»±.

3\. Highest index â†’ tá»‡

* LÃ  **chá»‰ sá»‘ chunk lá»›n nháº¥t mÃ  server Ä‘Ã£ nháº­n**, khÃ´ng quan tÃ¢m Ä‘áº¿n sá»± liÃªn tá»¥c.  
* VÃ­ dá»¥, server cÃ³ chunks 0, 1, 2, 5, 6:  
  * highest index \= 6  
* DÃ¹ng Ä‘á»ƒ client biáº¿t khoáº£ng â€œgiá»›i háº¡n trÃªnâ€ mÃ  server Ä‘ang sá»Ÿ há»¯u

# **`Client pháº£i lÆ°u sessionId cá»§a má»i upload/download Ä‘ang cháº¡y`**

Khi báº¯t Ä‘áº§u upload/download:

CMD: UPLOAD\_INIT â†’ requestId \= X

Client pháº£i lÆ°u vÃ o local memory

   sessionId,  
   fileId,  
   type: upload,  
   path: "/path",  
   lastChunkSent: m, // cho Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§ chá»© chá»§ yáº¿u láº¥y tá»« server Ä‘á»ƒ gá»­i láº¡i  
   lastChunkReceived: n // dÃ¹ng khi lÃ  sessionDownload. \-\> SoT

`Náº¿u báº¡n Ä‘ang há»i â€œTCP connection session state trÃªn server cáº§n lÆ°u nhá»¯ng trÆ°á»ng gÃ¬ Ä‘á»ƒ quáº£n lÃ½ AUTH + SESSION_RESUME + UP/DOWN + Heartbeat?â€, thÃ¬ Ä‘Ã¢y lÃ  danh sÃ¡ch tá»‘i thiá»ƒu nhÆ°ng Ä‘á»§, Ä‘Ãºng thá»±c táº¿ vÃ  khÃ´ng thá»«a má»™t byte.`

`TÃ´i chia thÃ nh 3 nhÃ³m cho rÃµ:`  
 `(1) Connection-level state`  
 `(2) Upload/Download session state`  
 `(3) Heartbeat/timeout state`

---

# **`ğŸ”¥ 1) CONNECTION SESSION STATE (gáº¯n vá»›i tá»«ng TCP connection)`**

`ÄÃ¢y lÃ  state tá»“n táº¡i trong suá»‘t vÃ²ng Ä‘á»i TCP connection, trÆ°á»›c cáº£ upload.`

`struct ConnectionSession {`  
    `connId: uint64                // optional: id ná»™i bá»™ server cáº¥p`  
    `userId: uint32                // sau khi AUTH xong`  
    `isAuthenticated: bool         // AUTH thÃ nh cÃ´ng hay chÆ°a`

    `currentRequestId: uint32?     // sessionId mÃ  connection Ä‘ang phá»¥c vá»¥`  
                                  `// null náº¿u chÆ°a SESSION_INIT/RESUME`

    `lastHeartbeatTs: timestamp    // kiá»ƒm tra cháº¿t/káº¹t`  
    `createdAt: timestamp          // phá»¥c vá»¥ logging`  
    `remoteAddr: string            // IP:port, Ä‘á»ƒ debug há»£p lá»‡`  
`}`

`â¡ ÄÃ¢y lÃ  táº¥t cáº£ state báº¡n cáº§n Ä‘á»ƒ quáº£n lÃ½ má»™t TCP connection.`  
 `Nhá»¯ng cÃ¡i cÃ²n láº¡i Ä‘á»u náº±m á»Ÿ session upload/download (bÃªn dÆ°á»›i).`

---

# **`ğŸ”¥ 2) PERâ€“UPLOAD/DOWNLOAD SESSION STATE`**

`CÃ¡i nÃ y Ä‘Æ°á»£c lÆ°u riÃªng, khÃ´ng phá»¥ thuá»™c connection.`  
 `LÃ½ do: Ä‘á»ƒ resume Ä‘Æ°á»£c sau disconnect.`

`struct FileSession {`  
    `requestId: uint32`  
    `userId: uint32                // xÃ¡c minh user Ä‘Ãºng session`  
    `fileId: UUID`  
    `type: UPLOAD | DOWNLOAD`

    `totalChunks: uint64`  
    `lastCompleteChunk: uint64     // upload resume: N`  
    `receivedBitmap: bitset?       // optional: dÃ¹ng náº¿u há»— trá»£ out-of-order`

    `nextChunkToSend: uint64       // download resume`  
    `localTempFile: string`

    `expireAt: timestamp`  
    `createdAt: timestamp`  
`}`

`â®• Äiá»u quan trá»ng:`  
 `FileSession khÃ´ng náº±m trong connection, mÃ  náº±m trong má»™t map global:`

`map<requestId, FileSession>`

`â†’ Connection disconnect khÃ´ng lÃ m máº¥t session.`

---

# **`ğŸ”¥ 3) Heartbeat / timeout state`**

`KhÃ´ng cáº§n quÃ¡ nhiá»u biáº¿n, chá»‰ cáº§n:`

`ConnectionSession.lastHeartbeatTs`

`Rules:`

* `Má»—i khi nháº­n báº¥t ká»³ packet há»£p lá»‡ â†’ cáº­p nháº­t timestamp.`

* `Hoáº·c náº¿u báº¡n muá»‘n strict: chá»‰ khi nháº­n HEARTBEAT packet.`

`Server cÃ³ job 1s/5s:`

`if (now - lastHeartbeatTs) > HEARTBEAT_TIMEOUT:`  
    `close connection`

---

# **`â­ Tá»•ng káº¿t â€” 3 nhÃ³m trÆ°á»ng server cáº§n lÆ°u`**

## **`A. Connection-level (gáº¯n vá»›i TCP)`**

`âœ” userId`

# TCP conn state

typedef struct {  
int fd;                     // socket  
pthread\_mutex\_t write\_lock; // mutex báº£o vá»‡ write/send

int currentResquestId \= 0;

ConnState state;             // tráº¡ng thÃ¡i state machine hiá»‡n táº¡i: CONNECTED, AUTHENTICATING, IDLE, UPLOADING, DOWNLOADING, CLOSING  
time\_t last\_active;          // timestamp láº§n cuá»‘i nháº­n dá»¯ liá»‡u â†’ dÃ¹ng cho timeout / heartbeat  
bool logged\_in;              // client Ä‘Ã£ auth thÃ nh cÃ´ng  
uint32\_t user\_id;            // láº¥y tá»« AuthToken  
char auth\_token\[256\];        // lÆ°u token (náº¿u cáº§n xÃ¡c nháº­n trong phiÃªn)  
time\_t token\_expiry;         // thá»i háº¡n token  
time\_t last\_heartbeat;        // thá»i Ä‘iá»ƒm nháº­n heartbeat cuá»‘i , nhá»¯ng láº§n request bÃ¬nh thÆ°á»ng cÅ©ng tÃ­nh lÃ  heartbeat â†’ sau bao nhiÃªu lÃ¢u Ä‘Ã³ â†’ drop conn

bool busy\_worker;  
uint8\_t buf\[BUF\_SIZE\];  
size\_t buf\_len;

} Conn.

Khá»Ÿi táº¡o mutex khi táº¡o ra Conn.

* Khi táº¡o `Conn`, khá»Ÿi táº¡o mutex:

`pthread_mutex_init(&conn->write_lock, NULL);`

# HÃ m gá»­i safe thread vÃ  gá»­i toÃ n bá»™

ssize\_t send\_exact(int fd, const void \*buf, size\_t len) {  
    size\_t total\_sent \= 0;  
    const char \*p \= buf;

    while (total\_sent \< len) {  
        ssize\_t n \= send(fd, p \+ total\_sent, len \- total\_sent, 0);  
        if (n \< 0\) {  
            if (errno \== EINTR) continue;   // bá»‹ signal, retry  
            return \-1;                      // lá»—i tháº­t sá»±  
        }  
        if (n \== 0\) break;                  // socket Ä‘Ã³ng  
        total\_sent \+= n;  
    }  
    return total\_sent;  
}

// \--- conn\_send: thread-safe gá»­i toÃ n bá»™ dá»¯ liá»‡u \---  
ssize\_t conn\_send(Conn \*c, const void \*buf, size\_t len) {  
    if (\!c) return \-1;

    pthread\_mutex\_lock(\&c-\>write\_lock);  
    ssize\_t sent \= send\_exact(c-\>fd, buf, len);  
    pthread\_mutex\_unlock(\&c-\>write\_lock);

    return sent;  
}

Náº¿u cÃ³ nhiá»u thread gá»­i dá»¯ liá»‡u trÃªn cÃ¹ng socket, **mutex \+ send\_exact()** Ä‘áº£m báº£o:

1. Chá»‰ 1 thread gá»­i táº¡i 1 thá»i Ä‘iá»ƒm.  
2. ToÃ n bá»™ gÃ³i tin Ä‘Æ°á»£c gá»­i Ä‘áº§y Ä‘á»§, khÃ´ng bá»‹ Ä‘an láº«n vá»›i thread khÃ¡c.

# Xá»­ lÃ½ file náº·ng ko block server

**Náº¿u vÃ­ dá»¥ 1 conn Ä‘ang muá»‘n lÃ m má»™t cÃ¡i lÃ¢u nhÆ° upload file lá»›n, tÃ´i muá»‘n chuyá»ƒn nÃ³ ra khá»i luá»“ng chÃ­nh Ä‘á»ƒ luá»“ng chÃ­nh xá»­ lÃ½ nhá»¯ng viá»‡c khÃ¡c. ThÃ¬ lÃ m nhÆ° nÃ o? VÃ  khi nÃ o thá»±c hiá»‡n xong upload thÃ¬ láº¡i gá»™p conn Ä‘Ã³ quay láº¡i cÆ¡ cháº¿ epoll**

Báº¡n muá»‘n **offload má»™t connection â€œnáº·ngâ€ (upload/download lá»›n) ra khá»i event loop chÃ­nh** Ä‘á»ƒ khÃ´ng block `epoll` â€“ vá» cÆ¡ báº£n lÃ  **tÃ¡ch viá»‡c I/O heavy ra worker thread**, rá»“i khi xong láº¡i Ä‘Æ°a káº¿t quáº£ vá» main loop. ÄÃ¢y lÃ  cÃ¡ch chuáº©n thÆ°á»ng dÃ¹ng:

Main thread (epoll):  
    \- Chá»‰ quan tÃ¢m accept new conn  
    \- Chá»‰ Ä‘á»c header / kiá»ƒm tra message  
    \- Náº¿u gÃ³i tin â€œnháº¹â€ â†’ xá»­ lÃ½ luÃ´n  
    \- Náº¿u gÃ³i tin â€œnáº·ngâ€ (upload/download lá»›n) â†’ dispatch vÃ o worker

Worker thread:  
    \- Xá»­ lÃ½ upload/download file  
    \- Ghi trá»±c tiáº¿p vÃ o temp file  
    \- Cáº­p nháº­t session struct (shared memory)  
    \- Khi xong â†’ gá»­i event vá» main thread

Main thread:  
    \- Nháº­n thÃ´ng bÃ¡o worker xong â†’ cÃ³ thá»ƒ tiáº¿p tá»¥c gá»­i cÃ¡c CMD khÃ¡c.

# Socket I/O

# Socket I/O

## **1\. Ã tÆ°á»Ÿng tá»•ng quÃ¡t**

1. **Main thread / main loop**

   * Chá»‰ quáº£n lÃ½ **accept new connection \+ read/write socket nhá»**

   * KhÃ´ng block vÃ¬ file lá»›n upload/download.

2. **Worker thread / thread pool**

   * Xá»­ lÃ½ upload/download chunk lá»›n.  
   * Khi xong, thá»±c hiá»‡n trao Ä‘á»•i vá»›i client xong task luÃ´n â†’ Há»§y luÃ´n thread

---

## **2\. CÃ¡ch triá»ƒn khai chi tiáº¿t**

### **a. Main loop (select/epoll)**

Conn \*conn; // struct per TCP connection

while (1) {  
    fd\_set read\_fds;  
    FD\_ZERO(\&read\_fds);  
    FD\_SET(listen\_fd, \&read\_fds);

    for each conn in connections:  
        if (\!conn-\>busy\_worker) // chá»‰ select fd náº¿u khÃ´ng Ä‘ang Ä‘Æ°á»£c worker xá»­ lÃ½  
            FD\_SET(conn-\>fd, \&read\_fds);

    select(...);

    if (FD\_ISSET(listen\_fd)) accept\_new\_conn();

    for each conn:  
        if (FD\_ISSET(conn-\>fd)) handle\_read\_write(conn);

    // check events tá»« worker thread (upload done, download done)  
    handle\_worker\_events();  
}

* `conn->busy_worker` \= true náº¿u conn Ä‘ang Ä‘Æ°á»£c worker xá»­ lÃ½ upload â†’ loáº¡i khá»i fd set main loop.

---

### **b. Worker thread**

* Khi main loop phÃ¡t hiá»‡n upload lá»›n â†’ Ä‘áº©y `Conn*` vÃ o **worker queue**.  
* Worker thread:

void \*upload\_worker(void \*arg) {  
    Conn \*c \= arg;  
    for each chunk:  
        read from conn-\>recv\_buf / TCP  
        write vÃ o file temp  
        update session-\>received\_chunks  
    c-\>busy\_worker \= false;   // mark xong  
    signal\_main\_thread(c);    // thÃ´ng bÃ¡o main loop  
}

* Worker khÃ´ng trá»±c tiáº¿p gá»i `select()` hay block main loop.  
* CÃ³ thá»ƒ dÃ¹ng **mutex \+ queue** Ä‘á»ƒ gá»­i thÃ´ng bÃ¡o hoÃ n táº¥t vá» main thread.

---

### **c. ThÃ´ng bÃ¡o main loop**

* Khi worker xong â†’ main loop nháº­n event â†’ tiáº¿p tá»¥c select fd Ä‘Ã³.  
* CÃ³ thá»ƒ dÃ¹ng pipe/eventfd:

// worker write(fd\_event, \&conn, sizeof(conn));

* Main thread Ä‘á»c pipe â†’ Ä‘Ã¡nh dáº¥u `conn->busy_worker = false` â†’ láº¡i FD\_SET trong select/epoll.

---

## **3\. Lá»£i Ã­ch**

* Main loop **khÃ´ng bá»‹ block**, váº«n xá»­ lÃ½ cÃ¡c client khÃ¡c.  
* Worker thread cÃ³ thá»ƒ upload/download file lá»›n **theo chunk**.  
* Káº¿t há»£p select \+ thread pool â†’ scalable cho nhiá»u connection Ä‘á»“ng thá»i.

### **4\. Gá»£i Ã½ nÃ¢ng cao**

* **Chunk-based**: worker Ä‘á»c tá»«ng chunk â†’ tráº£ control cho main loop â†’ giáº£m mutex contention.  
* **Thread pool**: trÃ¡nh táº¡o thread má»›i cho má»—i upload.  
* **Lock-free queue**: Ä‘áº©y `Conn*` giá»¯a main thread â†” worker.

Náº¿u báº¡n muá»‘n, tÃ´i cÃ³ thá»ƒ viáº¿t **skeleton C code** mÃ´ táº£ **main loop \+ worker thread \+ resume select()** cho upload file lá»›n, Ã¡p dá»¥ng trá»±c tiáº¿p cho há»‡ thá»‘ng TCP session cá»§a báº¡n. Báº¡n cÃ³ muá»‘n tÃ´i lÃ m luÃ´n khÃ´ng?

# Khá»Ÿi táº¡o worker thread Ä‘á»ƒ thá»±c hiá»‡n task náº·ng

\#include \<stdio.h\>

\#include \<stdlib.h\>

\#include \<pthread.h\>

\#include \<unistd.h\>

\#include \<stdbool.h\>

typedef struct {

    int fd;

    size\_t total\_size;

    size\_t received;

} Conn;

// \--- function worker \---

void \*upload\_worker(void \*arg) {

    Conn \*c \= (Conn \*)arg;

    printf("Worker: start upload for fd %d\\n", c-\>fd);

    while (c-\>received \< c-\>total\_size) {

        size\_t chunk \= (c-\>total\_size \- c-\>received \> 1024\) ? 1024 : c-\>total\_size \- c-\>received;

        usleep(1000); // simulate work

        c-\>received \+= chunk;

    }

    printf("Worker: upload done for fd %d\\n", c-\>fd);

    // thread tá»± exit, tÃ i nguyÃªn sáº½ Ä‘Æ°á»£c OS giáº£i phÃ³ng vÃ¬ thread detached

    return NULL;

}

// \--- push task \---

void start\_upload\_task(Conn \*c) {

    pthread\_t tid;

    pthread\_attr\_t attr;

    pthread\_attr\_init(\&attr);

    pthread\_attr\_setdetachstate(\&attr, PTHREAD\_CREATE\_DETACHED);

    if (pthread\_create(\&tid, \&attr, upload\_worker, (void \*)c) \!= 0\) {

        perror("pthread\_create");

    }

    pthread\_attr\_destroy(\&attr);

}

int main() {

    Conn c \= { .fd \= 1, .total\_size \= 10000, .received \= 0 };

    start\_upload\_task(\&c);

    // main thread váº«n cháº¡y tiáº¿p, cÃ³ thá»ƒ xá»­ lÃ½ cÃ¡c fd khÃ¡c

    sleep(1); // giáº£ láº­p main loop

    printf("Main thread continues\\n");

    sleep(2); // chá» worker xong

    return 0;

}

# Xá»­ lÃ½ cÃ¡c chá»©c nÄƒng

# ÄÄƒng nháº­p vÃ  phiÃªn

# ÄÄƒng nháº­p, phiÃªn Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p \- token

username, password  
Sá»­ dá»¥ng token Ä‘á»ƒ quáº£n lÃ½ phiÃªn.  
Má»—i message gá»­i kÃ¨m token. 

### **MÃ´ hÃ¬nh quáº£n lÃ½ phiÃªn Ä‘á» xuáº¥t (simple token-based session)**

#### **1\. Khi Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p**

Client gá»­i:

 `{`  
  `"action": "login",`  
  `"username": "khoi",`  
  `"password": "123456"`  
`}`

* Server kiá»ƒm tra username/password trong DB (`users` table).  
  Náº¿u há»£p lá»‡, sinh **session\_token** ngáº«u nhiÃªn (vÃ­ dá»¥ 32 bytes, hex string):  
   `char token[65];`  
  `generate_random_token(token);`  
* LÆ°u vÃ o **báº£ng sessions** (hoáº·c bá»™ nhá»› cache):

+ Gá»­i láº¡i client:

# Luá»“ng Upload file

# Luá»“ng Upload file

Tuyá»‡t vá»i â€” Ä‘Ã¢y chÃ­nh lÃ  pháº§n â€œxÆ°Æ¡ng sá»‘ngâ€ cá»§a há»‡ thá»‘ng chia sáº» file qua TCP mÃ  báº¡n Ä‘ang thiáº¿t káº¿.

## **Má»¥c tiÃªu thiáº¿t káº¿**

| YÃªu cáº§u | Giáº£i phÃ¡p |

## **Hash khi file Ä‘Æ°á»£c gá»­i tá»«ng pháº§n**

### **CÃ¡ch thá»±c hiá»‡n trong C (OpenSSL):**

* `SHA256_Update()` cÃ³ thá»ƒ gá»i nhiá»u láº§n â€” má»—i láº§n thÃªm dá»¯ liá»‡u má»›i.

# Táº¡i sao khÃ´ng gá»­i trá»±c tiáº¿p file lá»›n qua TCP?

# PhÃ¢n quyá»n

## **PhÃ¢n quyá»n (Permission System)**

Bao gá»“m cÃ¡c quyá»n sau cho má»™t file:

| Permission | MÃ´ táº£ | Quyá»n thao tÃ¡c |
| ----- | ----- | ----- |
| owner | ngÆ°á»i táº¡o (chia sáº», Ä‘á»‘i tÃªn, xÃ³a, **di chuyá»ƒn file**) | full (CRUD, share) |
| write | Ä‘Æ°á»£c chá»‰nh sá»­a tÃªn, xÃ³a, chia sáº» file cho ngÆ°á»i khÃ¡c, xÃ³a chia sáº», quyá»n xem | read, update |
| read | cÃ³ quyá»n táº£i vá», truy cáº­p trang Ä‘á»ƒ táº£i vá» | read-only |
| none | khÃ´ng truy cáº­p. Tuy nhiÃªn khi truy cáº­p vÃ o cÃ³ quyá»n Ä‘Æ°á»£c request má»Ÿ quyá»n. | tá»« chá»‘i |

Quyá»n tÆ°Æ¡ng tá»± Ä‘á»‘i vá»›i folder:

- owner: toÃ n quyá»n: Ä‘á»•i tÃªn, chia sáº», xÃ³a, di chuyá»ƒn folder

- read: Ä‘Æ°á»£c xem folder nhÆ°ng chá»‰ hiá»‡n thá»‹ nhá»¯ng file Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c chia sáº» vá»›i mÃ¬nh trong folder Ä‘Ã³  
- none: Tá»« chá»‘i truy cáº­p \+ cÃ³ thá»ƒ request má»Ÿ quyá»n.   
  - KhÃ´ng thá»ƒ set up **none** náº¿u ngÆ°á»i Ä‘Æ°á»£c chia sáº» folder Ä‘Ã£ upload file lÃªn
